titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the New Haven and Connecticut Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender Collection
New Haven and Connecticut Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by Mary Caldera and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 11:15

did.unittitle: New Haven and Connecticut lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender collection

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: This intentionally assembled collection documents lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender people, organizations, and events in New Haven and Connecticut. The collection consists of newsletters, flyers, posters, and other printed material.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Frank Gagliardi and various donors, 2006-2009. Boxes 17 and 18 transferred from RU 963 (Accession 2005-A-060), 2004. Boxes 19 and 20 transferred from the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, 2010.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: New Haven and Connecticut Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender Collection (MS 1878). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in two series: I. Publications, 1972-2007. II. Organizations, 1978-2007.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This intentionally assembled collection documents lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender people, organizations, and events in New Haven and Connecticut. The collection consists of newsletters, flyers, posters, and other printed material.

A Lesbian position

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series, arranged alphabetically by title, consists of publications, primarily newsletters, by or about lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender individuals and organizations.

did.unittitle: CT Coalition Update , Volume 1, Issue 3 and Volume 2, Issue 1
The Force , Volume 1, Numbers 3 and 5 and Volume 2, Number 1
Invert: The Journal of Gay and Lesbian Sensibility , Volume 2, Number 3
A Lesbian Position: The Newsletter (New Haven)

odd.head: General
odd.p: Includes production mock-ups for some issues.

did.unittitle: Volume 9, Numbers 1-[9] [cover of number 9, December is mis-labeled as number 7, October], 11-12
Volume 15 [13 issues] [cover of issue 7, October is mis-labeled as issue 6, September]
Volume 16, Numbers 2-8 [no number 1; see numer 13 of volume 15], 10-12
Numbers 1-[2] [cover of number 2, May is mis-labeled as number 1, May], 4, 6, 8
Numbers 4, [5?] [cover of number 5 Aug is mis-labeled as number 4 Aug], 9-12
MECA Advocate , Volume 1, Issue 1 [Multi-Ethnic Cultural Awareness Center, Urban League of Greater Hartford, Inc.]
MCC News [Metropolitan Community Church, Connecticut Valley]
Numbers 5-8 [cover of number 6, March 15, is mis-labeled as number 5]
Numbers 20-25 [number 24 is mis-labeled as number 23 on table of contents page]
Numbers 1-5, 7 [number 3, Feb 15-28, is mis-labeled as number 1 on table of contents page; no issue 6]
Issues 14-15 [issue 22, Late November, is mis-labeled issue 21, Early November]
Issues 12-24 [issue 23, Early December, cover is mis-labeled Late December]
Issues 1-5 [issue 4, Late February, cover is mis-labeled issue 3, Early February]

Radia: New Haven's Feminist Calendar and Newsletter [New Haven Women's Liberation Center]
Sister: New Haven women's liberation newsletter

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series, arranged alphabetically by organization name, consists of printed material such as announcements, flyers, poster, and programs. Publications are listed in Series I.
